name: Smart Home
description: Introducing our state-of-the-art smart home solution, allowing you to seamlessly connect, integrate, monitor, control, and automate a wide range of devices from a single app (available on web, iOS, and Android). This is an ongoing project; new devices are being added and the UI is under construction.

name: Family Website
description: Plan events, share media, and connect with family members.

name: System Monitor Widget
description: This widget overlays the system wallpaper and provides critical information such as CPU temp, memory usage, and network speed.
